name: [WPL-T7989]
description:
Approval groups can be set on the user but with some restrictions in mind, for retail client approval group can not be corporate and for corporate it cant be retail.
if we want to set approval group for retail, we need to Choose Retail as option and if we want to set it for corporate, we should choose corporate

labels.name: story
labels.value: Role Page -> Actions tab -> Pressing "Three dots" -> Edit -> Limits tab -> Approval Group
